content: DETROIT  Sept 28 United Parcel Service Inc and Chinese express delivery company SF Holding said on Thursday they have received approval from Chinese regulators for an international package delivery services joint venture. The two companies have been working together since 2015 and announced their planned alliance "to collaborate on development and provision of international delivery services" back in May. With approval from China's Ministry of Commerce  the firms said in a statement
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPDATE 1-China regulator OKs joint venture of UPS  SF Holding

content: DETROIT  Sept 28 United Parcel Service Inc and Chinese express delivery company SF Holding said on Thursday they have received approval from Chinese regulators for an international package delivery services joint venture. Under the joint venture  the two companies will initially provide package delivery services from China to the United States  which will be expanded to other countries in the future. (Reporting By Nick Carey; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama)
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: China regulator approves UPS  SF Holding joint venture

content: By Tom Hals     WILMINGTON  Del  Sept 5 Roughly 34 000 union members who work for United Parcel Service Inc         and other logistics companies in New York will decide on Wednesday whether to accept deep pension cuts in what could be the start of a wave of benefit reductions to shore up union retirement plans.     If approved  pensions for retired teamsters from nine New York local unions will be cut 29 percent  which the plan's trustees have said will lower the typical monthly
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: NY teamsters weigh pension cuts in groundbreaking vote

content: NEW YORK The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission has sued United Parcel Service Inc  accusing the world's largest package delivery company of discriminating against male workers and job applicants who wore beards or long hair because of their religion.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: U.S. EEOC sues UPS for religious bias against bearded men

content: NEW YORK  July 15 The U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission has sued United Parcel Service Inc   accusing the world's largest package delivery company of discriminating against male workers and job applicants who wore beards or long hair because of their religion.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPDATE 2-U.S. EEOC sues UPS for religious bias against bearded men

content: NEW YORK  July 15 United Parcel Service Inc  was sued on Wednesday by the U.S. Equal Employment Opportunity Commission  which accused the package delivery company of discriminating against employees and job applicants whose religious practices conflicted with its uniform and appearance policy.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: EEOC sues UPS for alleged religious discrimination

content: FRANKFURT  June 25 The top executives of many a corporate giant must feel like the fictional character Gulliver  waking up to find themselves under attack from modern-day Lilliputians  small start-up companies which overwhelm their established rivals with new technologies.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: Many big companies live in fear for their future in digital age

content: WASHINGTON UPS has agreed to pay $25 million to settle some  allegations that it submitted false claims to the U.S. government in an attempt to hide late deliveries  according to court documents unsealed on Tuesday and released by the U.S. Department of Justice.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPS to pay $25 million to settle some allegations over delivery times

content: WASHINGTON  May 19 UPS has agreed to pay $25 million to settle some  allegations that it submitted false claims to the U.S. government in an attempt to hide late deliveries  according to court documents unsealed on Tuesday and released by the U.S. Department of Justice.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPDATE 2-UPS to pay $25 mln to settle some allegations over delivery times

content: CHICAGO Package delivery giant UPS does not expect to change its current expansion plan in Europe despite a recent acquisition bid by main rival FedEx that would knock the firm into third place on the continent  a top executive said on Tuesday.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPS CFO - Europe plans unchanged by possible TNT deal

content: CHICAGO United Parcel Service Inc  on Tuesday reported higher first-quarter net profit due to price increases and productivity improvements  and reaffirmed its earnings outlook for 2015.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPS profit lifted by pricing  maintains 2015 earnings outlook

content: CHICAGO  April 28 United Parcel Service Inc  on Tuesday reported higher first-quarter net profit due to price increases and productivity improvements  and reaffirmed its earnings outlook for 2015.

title: UPDATE 2-UPS profit lifted by pricing  maintains 2015 earnings outlook

content: CHICAGO  April 28 United Parcel Service Inc  on Tuesday reported a higher quarterly net profit  which rose thanks to price increases and productivity improvements.

title: UPS quarterly profit rises  helped by price increases

content: BERLIN United Parcel Service Inc.  plans to invest 1 billion euros ($1.06 billion) in Europe to expand its package delivery network  German magazine Wirtschaftswoche reported on Sunday  without citing its sources.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPS to invest $1.06 billion in Europe: Wirtschaftswoche

title: Deals of the day- Mergers and acquisitions

content: AMSTERDAM FedEx Corp  is to buy Dutch package delivery firm TNT Express  for an agreed 4.4 billion euros ($4.8 billion)  stepping up the challenge to rivals United Parcel Service  and Deutsche Post  in Europe. | Video
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: FedEx to buy TNT for $4.8 billion to take on rivals in Europe

content: CHICAGO  April 7 FedEx Corp's $4.8 billion bid Tuesday for TNT Express took the world's last large potential package delivery acquisition target off the table  marking a victory in FedEx's battle to gain market share from rival United Parcel Service Inc.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: In TNT  FedEx may get last major package target UPS once sought

content: * GRAPHIC: http://link.reuters.com/rub54w   (Adds quotes from FedEx executives from analyst call)

title: UPDATE 7-FedEx to buy TNT for $4.8 bln to take on rivals in Europe

content: AMSTERDAM  April 7 TNT Express  Chairman Antony Burgmans said on Tuesday he is highly confident that the FedEx offer to buy TNT Express will not meet the same fate as a bid from UPS which was blocked by European regulators in 2013.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: REFILE-TNT Express chairman "certain" EU will approve FedEx deal

content: NEW YORK  April 1 A New York lawyer was arrested on Wednesday for his alleged role in a scheme by the son of a former United Parcel Service Inc executive to fraudulently obtain millions of dollars to finance the purchase of Maxim magazine  the lawyer's counsel said.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: N.Y. lawyer charged for alleged role in scheme over Maxim magazine

content: NEW YORK  April 1 A New York lawyer was charged on Wednesday over his alleged role in a scheme by a former United Parcel Service Inc executive's son to fraudulently obtain millions of dollars to finance the purchase of Maxim magazine.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: UPDATE 1-N.Y. lawyer charged for alleged role in scheme over Maxim magazine

content: WASHINGTON The U.S. Supreme Court on Wednesday sided with a former driver for UPS Inc by giving her another chance to argue that the package delivery company discriminated against her when it refused to lighten her work duties while she was pregnant.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: U.S. Supreme Court revives pregnant worker’s case against UPS

content: NEW YORK  March 6 U.S. consumers battered by the wretched winter weather still afflicting much of the eastern half of the country have responded by ordering in rather than eating out  flying more frequently to Florida and cutting out trips to the mall  according to a Reuters review of company data.
name: United Parcel Service Inc
title: CORRECTED--Weather-battered US consumers skip mall  order in and head south

content: NEW YORK  March 6 U.S. consumers battered by the wretched winter weather still afflicting much of the eastern half of the country have responded by ordering in rather than eating out  flying more frequently to Florida and cutting out trips to the mall  according to a Reuters review of company data.

title: Weather-battered US consumers skip mall  order in and head south

content: New York City and New York state sued United Parcel Service Inc. on Wednesday  seeking over $180 million in damages and penalties against the shipping company for allegedly delivering nearly 700 000 cartons of untaxed cigarettes across the state.
